SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: A measurement of the total cells of a pre-specified type in a specimen.
A measurement of the total number of microbial colonies of a pre-specified microorganism in a specimen.
The determination of presence or absence of an entity in a specimen.

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: Cp Number;Crossing point Number;Ct;Ct Number;Cycle Threshold;Cycle Threshold #;Cycle Threshold Number;Elbow Value;Take-off Point Number;Threshold Cycle;Threshold Cycle Number;TOP Number
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The cycle number where the fluorescence of the target is detected above the background signal or a pre-set threshold. This value may be used for the computation of the concentration of a target in a polymerase chain reaction (PCR).
The determination of the quantity of a pre-specified analyte in a specimen.
A measurement of the total number of viral particles of a pre-specified virus in a specimen.
